summary: Add API documentation generation to the TypeScript SDK release flow. Publish generated docs to a docs branch organized by package version.
userImpact: Users cannot easily access offline API documentation for the TypeScript SDK without building it locally.
proposedFix: Integrate documentation generation into the release flow and publish to docs branch under package version folders. Integrate with main documentation site.
resolutionDetails: Docs integrated into the documentation site via temporalio/documentation#354. Versioned docs support planned for future.
keyQuote: Docs will be integrated into the docs site. We'll add versioned docs once the documentation repo supports it.
